meanings.definition: A vehicle used for pulling farm machinery or trailers.
meanings.sent1: The farmers used tractors to plow the fields.
meanings.sent2: The tractor pulled the heavy equipment effortlessly.
meanings.sent3: The talking tractor cracked jokes as it worked in the fields.
meanings.sent4: The tractors of progress paved the way for modern agriculture.
meanings.sent5: The bright red tractor stood out against the green fields.

meanings.definition: A person or thing that pulls or draws something along.
meanings.sent1: The little boy was the tractor in the tug-of-war game.
meanings.sent2: The magnet acted as a tractor, pulling the metal objects towards it.
meanings.sent3: The tractor of the group, she always led the way.
meanings.sent4: His determination was the tractor that pulled him through tough times.
meanings.sent5: Her infectious laughter acted as a tractor, drawing everyone closer.
